tool_description: Configures pricing rules and models for reward items including fixed pricing, tiered pricing, dynamic pricing, and promotional pricing with date ranges and conditions.

item_id.description: Unique identifier of the reward item to configure pricing for

pricing_model.description: Pricing strategy: fixed, tiered, dynamic, promotional

base_price.description: Base price in points or currency (must be positive)

currency_type.description: Type of currency: points, cash, mixed

tier_multipliers.description: Array of multiplier values for tiered pricing (e.g., [1.0, 0.9, 0.8])

tier_thresholds.description: Array of tier threshold values (e.g., [0, 1000, 5000] points)

minimum_spend.description: Minimum spending requirement to access this pricing

error_messages: Invalid item_id: Reward item must exist before configuring pricing. Use Reward Item Creator first.
Invalid pricing_model: Must be one of [fixed, tiered, dynamic, promotional].
Invalid base_price: Price must be a positive number greater than 0.
Invalid currency_type: Must be one of [points, cash, mixed].
Tier configuration mismatch: tier_multipliers and tier_thresholds arrays must have the same length when both are provided.
Invalid promotional_discount: Discount percentage must be between 0-100.
Invalid date range: price_start_date must be before price_end_date when both are provided.
Conflicting pricing rules: Only one active pricing rule per item is allowed for the same time period.
usage: Provide item_id, pricing_model, base_price, and currency_type. For tiered pricing, include both tier_multipliers and tier_thresholds arrays. For promotional pricing, set promotional_discount and optionally price_start_date and price_end_date.

pricing_rule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created pricing rule

configuration_status.description: Status of pricing configuration (active, pending, failed)

effective_price.description: Current effective price based on the configuration

pricing_summary.description: Human-readable summary of the pricing configuration
